name: Eight Hours (Munix  Entertainment)
description:
Eight Hours

Eight Hours is an indie video game that consists of the story of a night guard who lives in Eptimistia, a communist country. He works nights at a meat processing factory. One night during an altercation he discovers a great secret.

Controls:
  • W/S/D/A are the keys to move
  • Z and X to turn the flashlight on and off
  • E are the kay to interact or search
Relevant information:

The game is in a primitive phase where only a technical demo can be played, with some basic functions. If you are interested in development you can follow us on Itch.io .
